弔.definition: a string of 100 cash (arch.); to lament; to condole with; variant of 吊[diao4]

弔伐.definition: to console the people by punishing the tyrants (abbr. for 弔民伐罪|吊民伐罪[diao4 min2 fa2 zui4])

弔古.definition: to revisit the past; to commemorate

弔喪.definition: to visit the bereaved to offer one's condolences

弔慰.definition: to offer condolences; to console the bereaved

弔文.definition: paper prayers for the dead burnt at funerals

弔死問疾.definition: to grieve for the sick and the dying; to show great concern for people's suffering

弔民伐罪.definition: to console the people by punishing the tyrants (idiom)

弔祭.definition: a worship ceremony for the dead; to offer sacrifice (to ancestors); a libation

弔詭.definition: bizarre; paradoxical; a paradox (from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3])
